message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9500. I believe it's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to counteroffer at $8500.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8500 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $9000? I'm confident this product will be worth every penny to you.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $8750 for the product. This feels like a fair compromise given its value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still a bit away from your offer.  Let's try $8900. This is a good compromise, and I'm confident you'll see the value in this product.
Alice, I'm glad we're making progress. I'd like to counteroffer at $8800. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me.
